taskDescription:
If set <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>A</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A</annotation></semantics></math> is a subset of set <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>B</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">B</annotation></semantics></math>, then <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>A</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A</annotation></semantics></math> union <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>B</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">B</annotation></semantics></math> is equal to set ___________.
